column3:
Your PNG is 10bytes larger... :-)

```
-rw-r--r--  1 jonasschnelli  staff  2444 13 Nov 20:24 network_disabled_luke.png
-rw-r--r--  1 jonasschnelli  staff  2432 13 Nov 20:25 network_disabled_marco.png
```

I slightly prefer this solution over #9145.
#9145 looks better now, and @MarcoFalke has a point with the overlapping paths (although it's barely visible), so closing this\n

The issue is that those paths are overlapping, so I don't see another way than to merge them...

Overlapping paths don't matter when opacity is either 0 or 1, but the overlapping becomes visible when opacity is a fraction.
